text: Robert McCullogh (20 June 1892 – 1972) was an English professional footballer who played as an inside forward for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1892 births Category:1972 deaths Category:People from Gateshead Category:English footballers Category:Association football inside forwards Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:South Shields F.C. (1889) players Category:English Football League players
title: Bob McCullogh
